name: 呂振森
objective: 1. 機率空間 2. 隨機變數、向量、程序 3. 期望值 4. 隨機序列的收斂性和大數法則 5. 有用的隨機程序 6. 穩定性隨機程序及條件式期望值.
schedule:
第 1-3  週 Probabilities and measures
第 4-6  週 Random variables, random vectors and random processes
第 7-10  週 Expectation and Inequality (含 1st mid-term exam-3 problems)
第 10-12  週 Convergence of Random Sequence, Law of Large Number and Characteristic Functions.
第 13-15  週 Specification of random processes (含 2nd mid-term exam-3 problems)
第 16-17  週 Stationary, conditional probability/expectation, and ergodic properties
第 18  週 Final exam - 5 problems
scorePolicy: 成績評量，主要來自 2 次期中考及 1 次期末考，題目共 11 題，採最佳 10 題作為原始成績，再加以調整。 若遇學期放假次數過多 (如國定假日及颱風等)，將調整為 1 次期中考及 1 次期末考，題目仍為 11 題。
materials:
參考書目:
1.“Random Processes – a mathematical approach for engineers”,  Robert M. Gray and Lee D. Davisson, Prentice-Hall 1986.
2.“Probability and Measure”, 3rd Edition, Patrick Billingsley, New York-Wiley, 1995.
3.“Probability, Random Variables, and Stochastic Processes”, 3rd Edition, Athanasios Papoulis, McGraw-Hill, 1991.
4. “Introduction to Random processes”, Eugene Wong.
5“Probability, Random Processes, and Ergodic Properties”, Robert M. Gray, Springer, 2009.
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
